ygData.subject: Heritrix 1.4 fails to follow redirectoins off seed
ygData.msgSnippet: The previous verion of heritrix host scope would follow immediate redirects from the seed.  The current version no longer works in this fashion. We are using

Subject: Heritrix 1.4 fails to follow redirectoins off seed
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=186379482; y=mlSgg2V4RJEnc7jkj84MftuYrjLu2xpngZv6VxjXWxtvpoo

The previous verion of heritrix host scope would follow immediate 
redirects from the seed.  The current version no longer works in this 
fashion. We are using  the HostQueuesFontier.   The current version 
only pulls the main pages from the immediate redirect.  In order for 
the complete site identified in the immediate redirect to be pulled 
back the hostname has to be added to the seeds list.  With the current 
version of software the method considerAsSeed in PostSelector actually 
returns a value so the candidate url is set as a seed, however for it 
to actually be added to the seeds list the receive method of 
HostQueuesFontier  expect the method curi.getVia() to return something 
other than null.  No where is Via ever set to value so the url is not 
added to the seed list.
